channel.title: open-source on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in open-source on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 34: Geeking out on .NET with Nick Chapsas
item.description: In this episode, I was thrilled to be joined by Nick Chapsas! If you’re a .NET developer - then his YouTube channel is an absolute must! Given all the amazing topics he covers on his channel - it would have been a shame to just chat with him about a single topic! So we decided to do a few lightning topics instead! Here’s what we geeked out on… .NET 6 Minimal API The outdated opinion of some non .

item.title: Episode 31: MassTransit and Open Source - with Chris Patterson
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Chris Patterson to chat about the open-source distributed messaging framework, MassTransit. We also spoke about open-source, event-driven architecture, docker, k8s, testing, Rider, and more! Chris’s social links Twitter Github YouTube Links from the show MassTransit MassTransit Discord RabbitMQ Azure Service Bus Apache Kafka Azure Event Hub Kubernetes Istio Linkerd JetBrains Rider Visual Studio Live Share JetBrains Code With Me Past podcast episode re.
